H0.text: What is the sweet clear liquid by-product from soap manufacture, used in laxatives, explosives and antifreeze. Glycerin

H1.text: What is the sweet clear liquid by-product from soap manufacture, used in laxatives, explosives and antifreeze. Ethanol

H2.text: What is the sweet clear liquid by-product from soap manufacture, used in laxatives, explosives and antifreeze. Propylene Glycol

H3.text: What is the sweet clear liquid by-product from soap manufacture, used in laxatives, explosives and antifreeze. E422

A4.text: The hydrolysis, saponification, or transesterification of these triglycerides produces glycerol as well as the fatty acid derivative:

A5.text: Nitration gives nitroglycerin, an essential ingredient of various explosives such as dynamite, gelignite, and propellants like cordite.
